description:
nova/api/openstack/volume/__init__.py and nova/api/openstack/compute/__init__.py share 90% of the same code.

We should be able to use inheritance to DRY this up.
title: DRYup compute and volume APIRouters

comments.content:

We should be able to use inheritance to DRY this up.
